Text:
function EP03_13()

    --.承-3【8月第1週】「保守派と共学派」
    SaveData.Title = "保守派と共学派"

    --//BG：体育館
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG018aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0125.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Hmm. Indeed, the number of absentees is increasing." ]])

    MSG([[ A few days after the practice started in earnest. As the number of absentees gradually began to rise, I decided to consult Daria-san once. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Do you have a list of the students who are absent? Could you show it to me for a moment?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0566.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "Ah, I’ve compiled it in the notes on my phone. Please take a look." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Currently, the absentees include one member of the performer's group and four from the backstage crew. ]])

    MSG([[ The performer is Uran Ryuguuin. The backstage crew members are Iruka Soga, Yuhi Takeda, Nanana Shichijo, and Kasaki Miu. ]])

    MSG([[ They are not particularly close friends, and I can’t find any common ground, which is troubling. ]])

    MSG([[ However, it seemed that Daria-san saw something and winked at me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ib")
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,0,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Wink
 "I see. It’s no wonder you couldn’t notice their commonality." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0567.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Eh? Wh-what do you mean?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0128.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "All of the absent students are part of the escalator system from middle school and belong to the faction called the 'Conservative Group.'" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0568.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Conservative, faction?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was confused by the unfamiliar term. ]])

    MSG([[ Conservative means to maintain the status quo. The word is often used when discussing ideology, such as "conservatism." ]])

    MSG([[ I wondered why such a term would arise at Yuriai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ school. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "If you look at how disliked the boys' division is, Erika-kun, you should understand that the boys are by no means a welcomed presence." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0569.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "...Yes. I feel that it’s difficult to change the long-standing traditions of Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0130.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Exactly. But it’s also true that changes have begun. Once change starts, it cannot be stopped." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0131.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Once a single drop of stain settles, it can no longer be called pure white. All we can do is suppress the spread of the stain." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0132.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "The students who serve as this deterrent are called the 'Conservative Group.' They continuously say no to the board’s plan to increase the number of boys each year." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "If it weren’t for the Conservatives, the boys' division would likely be greatly expanded as soon as next year, and Yuriai Private Academy would completely lose its function as a 'prestigious girls’ school.'" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0570.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Panicked
 "Is the coeducation plan that far along already?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Honestly, I was surprised. The boys' division had three seniors before, and this year there are two. Their treatment is extremely poor. ]])

    MSG([[ I had somehow assumed their status would remain the same for a while. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0134.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "The board’s intentions are still mysterious. Yuriai Private Academy prides itself on evolving with the times, so it is said they are acting according to that belief." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "In fact, surprisingly many students have no problem accepting coeducation smoothly. That includes myself. I wouldn’t actively push for coeducation, but I would accept it if the school desires it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0136.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "However, the Conservatives label even neutral views like mine as betrayal. They lump us all together as 'Pro-Coeducation' and treat us as enemies." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0571.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Panicked
 "P-Pro-Coeducation!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Having said that much, I realized how precarious my own position was. ]])

    MSG([[ I had relied on the boys' power in the Princess Election and am planning a joint performance with the boys' division at the Hakuyosai festival. ]])

    MSG([[ This situation might mean... ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0572.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Could it be that I’ve unknowingly been counted as one of the 'Pro-Coeducation' group?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0137.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "No, not 'could it be'—you definitely are. In fact, you’re treated like the leader of the Pro-Coeducation faction." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0573.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Ehh!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "Some even suspect you are the board’s secret agent sent from the Pro-Coeducation faction to make coeducation happen—a 'spy'—I hear." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0574.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Panicked
 "Ehhhhhhhhhh!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was deeply shaken. But from the Conservatives’ point of view, their way of thinking was natural. ]])

    MSG([[ A newcomer who suddenly becomes 'Princess' and persistently promotes cooperation with the boys' division is suspicious beyond reason. It’s no wonder they assume there’s some hidden agenda. ]])

    MSG([[ I finally understood the meaning behind the mysterious looks Ryuguuin-san and Uran-san gave me. ]])

    MSG([[ They suspected me of being a 'spy'... an agent from the Pro-Coeducation faction. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0139.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "So, what do you say? Are you really a spy?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0575.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Panicked
 "N-no! I have nothing to do with the board!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Well, I am a spy in a certain sense (gender disguise meaning). Actually, I could say I’m in conflict with the board that is trying to cover up secrets about my sister. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s unfair to be thought of as an agent. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0140.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "I figured as much. It’s clear you’re a genuine good person. Hermes and Uran like you and trust you." ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0141.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "But Uran is the head of the Conservatives. She can never accept Erika’s position." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0576.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Uran-san... is the leader of the Conservatives?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Yes. Because she must lead the Conservatives, she must completely sever connections with the boys' division." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0143.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Even if that means opposing someone close to her, like you." ]])

    MSG([[ —So that’s what it means. ]])

    MSG([[ Conservatives versus Pro-Coeducation. The suspicious eyes aimed at me. Uran-san’s sudden change and harsh crackdown on the boys' division. ]])

    MSG([[ It all made sense. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s concern about cooperating with the boys was inevitable given her position. ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, Uran-san was not acting on her own will. She was representing the many who want to protect Yuriai Private Academy’s culture, objecting to me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0144.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Apparently, all this past month she’s been trying in her own way to win you over as an ally." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0145.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Like I once was. The closer you get to know the bond between you and the boys’ division, the more Uran must have felt heartbroken." ]])

    --//CI：ウランBU（悲しみ）目元切り抜き 055
LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000ab")
LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RYU01da")
LAYER_POSITION(201, 0, -25)
SET_CUTIN_01_XL(150,500)

    MSG([[ I outright rejected her efforts. That’s probably why Uran showed such a sad expression. ]])

RESET_CUTIN_01(150, 500)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0577.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Sad
 (Uran-san... you were suffering, weren’t you?) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0578.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Sad
 (I said such thoughtless things, without knowing anything...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ But now, I can’t take back my words. I can’t back down either. ]])

    MSG([[ Like Uran-san, I have a position. I represent the boys' division, class 1-A, and many knights—as a 'Battle Princess.' ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0579.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Once the Princess Election ends, I will tell Uran-san my true intentions. That I am not an agent of the board." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0146.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "That’s a good look. Makes me want to jump into bed with you right away." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0147.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "Honestly, I thought you’d lose your fighting spirit if I told you this story, so I held back. But that turned out to be an unfounded worry." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0580.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry smile
 "...Thank you. Honestly, I might have withdrawn from the election before." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I didn’t have the courage to fight on behalf of many others besides myself. ]])

    MSG([[ But now it’s different. Many knights and friends support me now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0581.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "I won’t say which side is right. Both have convictions and justice, so it can only be decided through earnest battle." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0148.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "That’s the spirit. I’ll be cheering for you. Do your best, Erika-kun." ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing those words, Daria-san warmly encouraged me from behind. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_14")
end
